argument.name: Column_Number
argument.description: The column number of the new index column.

page.discussion: The AddIndex() method adds a new index definition to a table definition. Names must not duplicate ("" counts as a name).
page.example: dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo dim IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo dim IndexColumn as SQL::IndexColumnInfo TableInfo.Name = "MyTable" IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .t. IndexColumn.Name = "MyColumnName" ? IndexInfo.AddColumn(IndexColumn) = .T. ? TableInfo.AddIndex(IndexInfo) = 1
